320a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de'i rjes la aM yig dmang po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag 
320a5(rgyud 'grel): po hUM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o// hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu gzhug pa sngon du 'gro bas so// de thams cad yongs 
320a6(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las gshin rje mthar byed bsam par bya'o// zhabs g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing nag/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rjes 
320a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i dbyug pa mthing nag bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed spro ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul gyis sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du nyi ma 
320a8(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa ma he'i steng du bsgom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ hU~M yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 
320b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa mthing nag las hU~M yig gi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba rnams snang bar byas te/ slar yang de la de bzhin du rab tu gzhug par bya'o// rim pa 'di nyid ji srid 'dod kyi bar du spro ba dang 
320b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya'o// dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas so// de bzhin du gnyis gsum bzhi'i thun mtshams su bsgom par bya'o// oM hrIHShI bi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA 
320b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya ma rI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag 
320b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi brtse ba'i dbang gis dman dang mchog rnams kyang / stobs kyis gdul bya'i skye rnams drag po ston mdzad 
320b5(rgyud 'grel): cing // phan pa sna tshogs sgrub mdzad sgyu ma'i gar gyi skur// gshin rje mthar byed de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// dang por sgrub bcas mchog tu bde ster stan la 'dug/ bsam gtan khang 
320b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dri bzangs kyis byugs yid mngon dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin yid kyis snying gar AHyig los// dmar po'i rnam par rab byung gtum po smig chu'i gzugs// de yi steng gnas 'od zer 
320b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas kha dog mthing // b+h+rUM yig 'od zer brgya 'gyed gshin rje gshed la sogs// yang dag mchog bya yid kyis rnam sprul me tog smos// mar me la sogs rnam mang gis mchod gus 
320b8(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal// sngon du byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags pa la sogs bya// 'gro rnams ma lus stong nyid mngon bya de nas kyang // oM shU n+ya tA sogs sngags mchog tu bya// bdag nyid 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo gus pas yongs bsgom pa// aM yig dmar po las byung nyi ma la gnas mthing // hUM yig gzugs la rdo rjes mtshan pa dbyug pa mthing // dbyug 
321a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la gnas hUM yig rab 'phro 'od dra can// rgyal ba ma lus bskul zhing gdan drangs rab tu gzhug/ de nyid blta zhing ma lus yongs bsngo phyi nas ni// bdag nyid myur du gshin rje mthar 
321a3(rgyud 'grel): byed rnam bsgom bya// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bcas pa// phyag g.yas na ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug mthing bsnams// phyag g.yon thugs kar sdigs 
321a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa// zhal gyi pad+ma smin ma sla ra dmar ser 'bar// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsang phyogs yang dag bsnams// zhal nas ljags ni ltos 'gro bzhin du 
321a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bskyod// sna tshogs chu skyes 'dab bcas steng du nyi ma la// yang dag bzhugs shing drag po ma he la zhon sgrogs// zhal ni mche gtsigs mi thung lto ba rab tu 'phyang // spyan ni 
321a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// klu brgyad khros pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing thod pa yi// phreng ba dkar po mnyam gshibs bcings shing zhal 'bro ba// mi mgo rlon pa'i do 
321a7(rgyud 'grel): shal mgul du rab bcings shing // ar+ha Da'i gad rgyangs bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kar nyi ma la// rab zhugs bruM yig dang ldan dbyug pa sngon po 
321a8(rgyud 'grel): bsam// der gnas bruM yig 'od kyis khams gsum snang byas shing // der bzhugs yun mi ring bar slar yang nang du bya// rim pa 'dis ni spro bsdu ji ltar 'dod par bya// slar yang dam 
321b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig sngon ma bzhin du kun byas te// thun mtshams bzhi ru 'di ni ma lus bsgom bya zhing // ngal bar gyur na ji bzhin pa sgrubs la sngags bzlas bya// bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed sgrub 
321b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs bsdus byas pas// byams pa dpal bdag dpag med bsod nams gang 'dis yis// 'gro ba ma lus bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed gyur// bdag kyang myur du 'di ni gshin rje 
321b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed shog/ de la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'o// oM hrIHSh+Ti bi kr-i tAn na trUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gshin rje gshed nag pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA d+hi swa d+ha na 
321b4(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// sprul sogs rgyan gyis rngam byas pa'i// gshin 
321b5(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed mgon phyag 'tshal nas// de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya// bde ba'i stan la yang dag 'dug/ snying gar nyi ma hUM yig dgod// der skyes mchod pa'i khyad par gyis// gus 
321b6(rgyud 'grel): pas khyab bdag yang dag mchod// de yis mdun du phyogs byas te// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// 'gro kun rang bzhin med par ni// skad cig gis blta de nyid las// snying/ 
321b7(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon rtags las byung // zhabs kyi chu skyes g.yon brkyang ba// khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal 'jigs la// sma ra smin ma dbu skra ser// zhal gsum ljags ni bskyod pa yis/ 
321b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can// spyan ni dmar zhing gsus tsha la// sprin nag gsar pa'i 'od zer can// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // ma he yis ni mtshon la bzhugs// 
322a1(rgyud 'grel): stag gi sham thabs mi'u thung // nga rgyal thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// nyi ma'i 'od zer gzi ma dngas che// sa stengs ma lus kun tu mchod// 'bar zhing 
322a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phreng ba rno// dus mtha' yis ni me dang mtshungs// rdo rje ral gri gtun shing drag/ ro langs sta re zhags pa bsnams// phyag g.yas dang ni g.yon pa yi// drug po 
322a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams su mdzes par bsnams// khro bcas 'jigs byed shin tu drag/ gshin rje mthar byed bdud 'joms pa// hUM yig gis gang mgrin bsams nas// 'dir ni de yi nga rgyal 
322a4(rgyud 'grel): snying gar ki rdor snyeng 'od kyis// gshin rje ldang ba bza' bar b+ha// mdun phyogs de nas mchod nas ni// rang dang rnam pa gcig byas te// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bon bzhis// yang 
322a5(rgyud 'grel): dag dgug dang gzhug pa dang // bcing dang gnyis pas bdag mchod cing // bsam gtan gyis ni mchod byas nas// yang dag bstod nas sngags bzlas bya// dge ba yongs su bsngo bya/ 
322a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing // langs nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// brtse ba gcig pu'i yid kyis spyad// de bzhin nyi ma so sor bya// dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma 'byung // 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
322a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// las mchog rab tu brkyang na yang // las kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul// mangs pas kho bos ma bshad do// bla ma'i man ngag de yang ni// rgyud las mngon 'dod bsgrub 
322a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mkhas pas 'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang // kun nas 'bad pas shes par bya// gtor ma nyer spyad rnal 'byor gyis// thun mtshams bzhi ru cho ga bya// bzlas pa'i 
322b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM hriHSh+Ti bi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bdag gis bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs nas// bsgrub thabs cho ga byas pa'i bsod nams kyis// 'jig rten pa rnams thams cad 
322b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa 'dis// mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu myur thob shog/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub tha ba rdzogs so// // dge'o// // @#// gshin rjes par gyin kyi grub papas rim zangs bzhugs so//

322b7(rgyud 'grel): ser sngon ma bzhin// zhal gsum ljags ni bskyod pa yis// 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can// spyan ni dmar zhing gsus chen la// sprin nag gsar pa'i 'od zer can// nyi ma'i 
322b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // ma he yi ni mtshon la bzhugs// mi thung stag gi sha ma thabs can// khengs pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// zhi ma'i 'od zer gzi mdangs can/ 
323a1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus phyogs rnams 'gengs byed pa// 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba can// bskal pa tha ma'i me dang mtshungs// 'khor lo ral gri gtun shing 'bar// ro langs dgra

323a3(rgyud 'grel): gis gang mgrin par bsgom// skrag pa rnams ni rnam par spang // nyi shu phyed kyi stong phrag gis// sngags rnams sngags ni rtag tu rig/ sems ni gzing bstod bzlas par bya// 'dis ni 
323a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo// sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga yis// 'di yis sngags pa'i sngags rnams 'grub// las kyi rjes 'brangs kha dog rnams// mangs pas bdag gis ma bshad do// bla 
323a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i man ngagra bsams nas ni// de las 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo// 'bad pa yis ni shes byas la// dpa' bo rnams kyis bsnyen pa'ang bya// gtor ma nyer spyad rnal 'byor gyis// thun

323a7(rgyud 'grel): ya man+ta ka sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub zabs/ dpal gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste/ rang gi 
323a8(rgyud 'grel): snying gar a yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la ye yig nag po bsgom par bya'o// de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang / sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas// yang dag par mchod cing sdig pa bshags 
323b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas yaM yig rtse las rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab par yang bya ste// smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o// de'i rjes su raM las byung 
323b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyi ma la hUM yi ga las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba/ rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de las skyes pa'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur bsgom par 
323b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig gnyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan ma/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang dag par
323b4(rgyud 'grel): blta'o// de'i steng du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rnam pa dag pa de la/ Da D+ha da d+ha ya ra la wa bzhi gnyis 'gyur dang bcas pa dang / ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed gnyis 'gyur yongs su

323b6(rgyud 'grel): ga dang yaM las yang dag par byung ba'i char sprin nag po gsar pa'i kha dog can gsus pa che ba/ smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ thung zhing rgyas la ma he la 
323b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ stag gis pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa/ ri dwags bdag po'i pags pas stod g.yogs byas pa/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa/ rang gi sku'i 'od zer gyis khro/ 
323b8(rgyud 'grel): bopo lnga 'phro bzhin pa sprul nas/ gdengs ka'i rgyal pos brgyan pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo brgya'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyi tho ba dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje 
324a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gsum gyis sdig mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// zhal drug pa dang po khro zhal dang / mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser

324a3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang mdzad pa/ zhabs gnyis gar stabs mdzad pa/ zhabs gzhan gnyis sems pa'i skyil krung mdzad pa/ nyi ma 'bar ba'i dbus su bzhugs shing bgegs rnams 'joms par mdzad

325a8(rgyud 'grel): shwaThA ra k+Sha tin/ bod skad du/ de rje d+hu mdzad kyi sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon du gsungs pa'i tshogs nam mkha'i khams su migasas 
325b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i nyi ma la hUM yig 'bar zhing 'bar ba la bskal pa tha ma'i me lta bu shin tu mchog tu kha dog gnag pa 'od zer chen po'o// de las skyes pa'i drag po chen po khams gsum zad par mdzad

325b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mgo bo rnams su oM AHhUM zhes pa'i yig gi gsum dbang bskur ba'i cho gas thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sngags ni oM hUM hUM phaT swatra/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sgrub 
325b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs rdzogs so// tebs pa ci'i sru thabs gnyis bzhugs sa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ba la sA d+hA na/ bid skad du/ stobs po che'i sgrub 
325b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ khro ba'i rgyal po stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon du gsungs pa'i tshogs stong pa nyid kyi mthar pad+ma dkar po dang nyi ma la hUM yig las byung ba'i stobs po che zhal gcig pa 
325b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa sku mdog thams cad dmar po// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'khyil ba/ sbrul gyis bcings pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dkar po dang / rnga yab bsnams 
325b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag g.yon pa gnyis kyis phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ zhal g.yon brkyang ba/ 
325b8(rgyud 'grel): zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi phreng ba can/ 'od dpag tu med pas dbu rgyan pa bsgom par bya'o// sngags bzlas par bya ste/ zhes pa ni stobs po che'i sgrub

366a6(rgyud 'grel): byas 'dam skyes zhabs// dugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur// rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog can gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni// 
366a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro// rang gri phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul// 'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor 
366a8(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams ni// ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la// ri skyibs zab mo ngas phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor 
366b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// rab tu myos ma pad+ma'i tshal lam la ya rlung dal bus g.yo zhing bskyod// 'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis zhe bang glu len me tog gi/ 'byung gnas ya 
366b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi bsngags pa rnams kyis ni// rdul sred 'bras su 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs byos chu'i mtshan la 'gro// khyed zhabs dka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i 
366b3(rgyud 'grel): skyed mos tshal la yun ring du// rtsed mo'i sprol spyan mig drag tu g.yo zhing dga' mchog rnams kyis ni// zhal gyi pad+ma'i dbugs rlung gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyod nas// de
366b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam smras dpas bran las drin ma snang rtsi rnams la'i'athung bar 'thung // rab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'byung myos pa'i skad sman lu byug gis khyab cing // sbrang rdzas myos pa'i bum po tshogs pa'i 
366b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dir ldan la so ga'i dpal yin te// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g.yo bar bshad gang ku mu da yi 'byung gnas dang / shel gyis gzhi bla gab med par phul byung zla ba'i cha shas khyed 'di lags/ 
366b6(rgyud 'grel): bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i rtser bkod pa zla ba'i nor bu'i chu rgyun ni/ bsrubs pas 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrog pa'i chu// dpyid dus chang gis myos shing 
366b7(rgyud 'grel): tshim pa khu brug skad snyan sgrog pa'i nam mkha' la// sa skyong gis sbal khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad nyid lags// glang chen mo che ba gzhan la bzo byas skar khung dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab 
366b8(rgyud 'grel): la// gnas shing rnam par sgeg bcas myos pa'i phug ron sgra snyan mgrin pa nas drag ste// nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu mjam zhing sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du// sa skyong 
367a1(rgyud 'grel): dag gi khyim la ti si'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid lags// nu mar nyer bzhag lag pa cig gis smad gos bshar ba g.yo ba'i mtha' bzung ste// rkyal zhing rtsed 
367a2(rgyud 'grel): mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khar ba'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing // skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum zhing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus// ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed
367a3(rgyud 'grel): mthu yis su// zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtsed mo'i ri las beb// rab tu myos ma'i nags kyis nyi legs pad+ma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams// rgun chad med par rlung
367a4(rgyud 'grel): yab dal bus g.yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g.yo zhing bskyod// nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin la ni zhin zhag 'da' bar 'gyur// chu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shang rma bya'i dkyil 
367a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don// 'dab skyes me thon la ni 'jam rlung rab tu g.yo zhing glu dbyangs chu gter dus// snyan ngag mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gting rings 
367a6(rgyud 'grel): rnga skad kyis// khang pa'i nad rnams yongs su gang ba khyed 'dod pas ni rgun du thos par 'gyur// sbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rigs 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btud byas las// lhung ba'i 
367a7(rgyud 'grel): man d+ha ra yi rdul gyis kun nas mdog ser ma phang mtsho las rgyal// lha'i grong khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khrud spro ba la// khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin rer rjes su myong 
367a8(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sprul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la// bgegs kyi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te/ 
367b1(rgyud 'grel): yur bar bskyod pa btum po'i hUM yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags sgrog gtor// lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags zlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur// gang gnas khang sa'i sbyor la glu 
367b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs 'du sar rab brdung gting ring rnga skad kyis// 'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gri'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni// de rjes kyi tshems bung ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog 
367b3(rgyud 'grel): la// rab tu myos pa rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha// rgyun chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin// g.yer ga'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol
367b4(rgyud 'grel): 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgo rnam par gtsugs// rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la/ khyed la bsten pas glu dbyangs bde bzhin rer ba de la longs 
367b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod 'gyur// rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs kar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang // zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams// khyed kyi
367b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yis rna lung rin chen 'od// lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i rnam pas rnam par brgyal bar de ma thag tu 'gyur// skad snyan dang ni ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro 
367b7(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham// 'gram logs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis gdar g.yo zhing 'khyil pa'i sgra yis 'dud pa 'byed// rked rmad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i do shal nu ma'i khur bu'i ljid kyis 
367b8(rgyud 'grel): dud// lha mos gang la gzigs pa de la rnga yab dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur// rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin te// nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mer zla 
368a1(rgyud 'grel): zer lo 'dab rnams lha 'gying ba yis// nu mar lag gcig nyer bzhag bud med skye bo dag gi bzung ba'i ga bur chu// kha 'bus ut+pal sngon po dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs/ 
368a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa skye// mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs la rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod// spyan mig la yang khro ba soms bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis dba' rlabs g.yo// mkhregs shing 'brur ba 
368a3(rgyud 'grel): nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur kum 'dam gyi kha dog ser// rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs la'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur// sprul byas pad+mar ga'i stegs la 'gro ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo 
368a4(rgyud 'grel): las// sprul te gcal bkram bu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang pa'i nang // des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs sgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la// bcom ldan 'das ma khyed 
368a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhabs zung mchod byed gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur// skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gyings// glang po 'dzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcags rab 'god phyed 
368a6(rgyud 'grel): btsums mig/ a mra sar bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams// bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur// spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur 
368a7(rgyud 'grel): te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lugs kyu g.yo// rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnams mang ca co'i bde bas chu thig gzer ma 'thor// bar du rgol ba'i glang chen chang gi sa khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grags pa las//

368b1(rgyud 'grel): rma bru rtse mor gnas pas bdag khang pa dang // nam mkha' chu bo'i rlabs kyi sa byas pa dri med rin chen ljon shing khang pa dang // bud med skye bo'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i 'byung gnas la yang gnas mdzad khyed nyid do//

368b3(rgyud 'grel): mche bo gtsigs// lha mo ze 'bru'i rdul gyi mdog ser rlabs ldan rdzing ldan yun ring gnas par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal ba dkon mcho ga cod pan spyi bor ldan pa pad+ma'i rigs// khyod nyid kun

369a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse rtse mo yis// brag 'joms shing drung rtsa ba 'don// khyod kyi sngags kyis bzlas pa las// 'jigs shing glang po 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa'i// du bas

371a7(rgyud 'grel): dang chu dang rgyal po'i chad pa// stag dang seng ge sbrul dang srin po// glang po che yi bred dngang sel ma// phyag 'tshal byin brlab rmad du gyur nas// 'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyi bskyed pa'i// srog 'phrog 
371a8(rgyud 'grel): nad kyi bye brag ma lus// khyod la gsol btab gdung ba sel ma// phyag 'tshal btsun mo rin chen cha byad// smin pa'i bar nas mdzod spu 'od 'bar// spyan dgu ut+pal me tog 'dra'i 'dzum mdangs/

377b8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin
378a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/

382a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang / brtul bzhugs mchog tu gyur pa'i rab tu bzod pa'i sgrol ma dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams
382a8(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi yon tan ma lus par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang / chos thams cad kyi srog rnam par 'dzin pa'i sgrol ma dang / sems dang las rab tu 
382b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i sgrol ma dang / yo byad kyi dbang phyug za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang / las dang skye ba yang dag par mkhyen cing grub pa'i sgrol ma dang / thabs nges par rnam par sbal ba'i sgrol ma dang 
382b2(rgyud 'grel): chos yang dag par grub pa rgya mtsho'i sgrol ma dang / smon lam gyi mchog legs pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrol ma dang / mos pa'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa chos kyi sgrol ma dang / rdzu 'phrul kun nas nges par

419a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar bya// skye bo rnam mang brten pas sdug bsngal kho na 'byung 'gyur gyi// bde ba 'byung bar thub pasam gsungs de phyir mkhas mchog gis// sngags g.yog dang

419a5(rgyud 'grel): don du sha dang nya sha 'bru rnams dang // bza' ba rnams dang sman rnams thams cad legs par gzhag par bya// mdor na gnas der gzhan gyi nger lta mi 'gyur longs spyod rnams//

424b2(rgyud 'grel): badzad brtags so// / rgya ga kyi mkhan pa dul ba la la dang / bad la rgyub dag slong ces kyi shes rab kyis bskur cing khrus te gtan la phab pa// bcom ldan

424b4(rgyud 'grel): nes dam bcas das/ l+h+wa ma ga la ma bsgom par byar// de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya ste/ rnal 'byor pa rang gi snying ga a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khar gyi steng du yi ge hUM bsam la/ de las 
424b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zeng lugs bu 'dra ba smos pas// lha mo dang rang gi tha ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la gsal bar bzlas te// de la phyag 'tshal ba dang 
424b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshegs pa dang / gsung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chub bsngo ba dang / lus dbul ba dang / sman lam gdab pa rnams byas la/ de nas ngan dam par bdag da 
424b7(rgyud 'grel): mi sogs pa rang bzhin med cing gdon mnas ma skyes par bsam ning / de brtan par bya ba'i phyir a sh+tsar+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka haM zhes pas stong pa nyid du bskum mo// de nas pa 
424b8(rgyud 'grel): badra'adab pa brgyad pa'i dbus su ngagi sems dang sngodan gyi sngon lam gyi dbang gas min d+halas l+h+wa ma sgral sa bskyed par byan/ de yeng supa dag sdang gugal gcig phrag gnyis ma byugagasas 
425a1(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gnas pa/ g.yon pas ut+pal bsdams pa/ don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ ji srid mi skyo 
425a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du bsgoms/ skyon bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o// oM tA re tu tA re tu re swA hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba rang gi snying ga nas phyung ste/ yang rang gi zhal du zhugs yang rang 
425a3(rgyud 'grel): gi sIng ga nas 'byung ba'i rim pa/ sngags kyi kha dog dkar po dal bus 'khor bar bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pas kyang skye na mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ste smon lam btab la// 
425a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam thams cad la gnas par bya'o// zhal ba'i tshe stong pa nyid du zhugs te zhal bar bya'o// yang langs pa'i tshe skad cig tsam gyis ldang bar bya'o// 'jigs pa
425a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad las skyob pa slob dpon mkhas pa dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dge'o// @'phags ma sprul la la bstod pa bzhugs/ 
425a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha min cod pan gyis/ 
425a7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi pad+mo la btud de// phongs pa kun las sgrol mdzad cing // sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo// rab 'bar dra bas khyab pa yi// mnar med me yis gdungs pa la// thugs rjes
425a8(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i char 'bebasam// sgrol ma la yang phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro drug gnas su yun rings su// yang dang yang du 'khor ba yi// dub pa dag la bde chen gyi// bde ba mchog gi 
425b1(rgyud 'grel): ngal so mdzad// gzhan don mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod// dran pa tsam gyis phongs sel ma// thugs rje brtse ldan khyod kyis ni// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad// dus rnams rtag tu 
425b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can la// bu bzhin snyoms pa'i lha mo khyod// 'gro ba'i lo tog thams cad la// char rgyun 'bebs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin du// 'gro ba sems can thams 
425b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// mun pa'i gdung ba sel mdzad ma// lha mo mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma zla ba ut+pa la// de bzhin dri med gdan stengs su// sku mdog sngo ldang 'gying bag can// 
425b4(rgyud 'grel): uta pal bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing // bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas// bsdu dngos bzhi yi 'gro rnams sdud
425b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma// thugs rje ngang can ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sku yi skyon spangs mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// gsung gi skyon spangs ka la bing ka'i dbyangs// thugs kyi skyon spangs shes
425b6(rgyud 'grel): bya mtha' dag mkhyen// bkra shes dpal 'bar mal phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar nor bu chu dang sa ltar// lha mo khyod kyi rtag par ni// 'gro ba'i sems rnyog sel mdzad cing // 'gro don 
425b7(rgyud 'grel): brtson la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi khyod kyi mtshan gzung cing // bstod dang sgrub pa byas pa rnams// rtag tu 'bras bu yod par mdzad// mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rje btsun
425b8(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma la bstod pa// dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // dga'o 
426a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// / @#rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags 
426a2(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gsum mgon yum gyur spyan yang sa ma// sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud nas// yun ring bla ma bsten las gang 'ongs pa'i// sgrub 
426a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs chog bsdus pa bshad par bya// yid 'ong gnas ni la la ru// me tog dri zhim ga cal ba kram te// spos kyi nyams dgar byas na sa ni// de dbus stan bzang bde ba la// 
426a4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i bde ba yongs spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor can gyi zher 'dug nas// snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i// 'od zer tshogs kyi bla ma dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
426a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// spyan drangs de dag mdun nyid du// mchod pa sa yang dag rab mchod nas// dkon mchog gsum sogs rjes dran bya/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma sA b+hA shud+d+ho ta/ 
426a6(rgyud 'grel): shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad stong pa nyid du rnam par bsam mo// de nas paM las byung ba'i pad+ma chen po'i dbus su rab tu rdzogs pa'i 
426a7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM ljang gu bsams te/ de yongs mu gyur pa las bdag nyid sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon pa ut+pa la 'dzin pa/ 
426a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu/ gzi brjid bzod par dka' ba dang ldan pa/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ skra'i tshogs lhag par bcings shing 
426b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i 'od can/ rdo rje skyil mo grung gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnan pa/ spyan pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma lta bu/ cung zad 'dzum pa mdun nyid du gzigs pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma nu ma'i 
426b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mkhreng ba dang ldan pa rnam par bsam mo// de nas rang gi snying ga'i tAM las 'od zer byung ba rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ yang dag par mchod nas ut+pa la'i
426b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas rang gi lus la bstim par bya'o// de nas gnas ji lta ba rnams su rnam par snar mdzad la sogs pa rnams bsam zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba
426b4(rgyud 'grel): don du gnyer te/ bdag gi dbu rgyan la gsung rdo rjes rgyas gdab par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tA la sogs pa rnam par bkod de/ spro ba 
426b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o// gang gi tshe skyo ba na/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so// de nas gang gi tshe ldang bar 'dod pa na rang gi snying ga 
426b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ des sems can thams cad dra nga la slar yang 'od zer spros pas de dag snying gar zhugs par lta zhing / de nyid kyis de dag thams cad lha 
426b7(rgyud 'grel): mo'i skur gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o// de nas slar yang sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rnams kyis gtor ma'i snod yongs su bkang la/ oM Ad+ho mu khaM sarba 
426b8(rgyud 'grel): d+harma NAM a d+ya nu ta pan na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la phul la/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhugs pa la dmigs pas yi ge brgya pa yongs su 
427a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas legs par mchod de/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol btab la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo// rim pa 
427a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis thun mtshams bzhir bsgoms nas myur bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// da ni srung ba'i sbyor ba cung zad bshad par bya ste/ sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum phrag bcu bzlas
427a3(rgyud 'grel): shing sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas pa'i cho ga snga ma lta bu nyid las khyad par du bsgrub bya'i ming sngags kyis dbus na gnas par bsam la bzlas pa ji srid 'dod 
427a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bon gyi yi ge las 'od zer byung bas bsgrub bya'i lus thams cad khyab par bltas te/ des lus rab tu tshim par gyur cing nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral bar 
427a5(rgyud 'grel): mos par bya'o// 'di ni zhi ba'i bsrung ba'o// de nas phyir bzlog po'i bsrung ba bshad pa/ cho ga snga ma dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar tAM ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs par 
427a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tsho gas 'bar bas gdug pa'i lus gcer bu skra grol bar 'dar zhing skyabs dang bral ba'i snying gar zhugs pas rengs pa dang mnan pa dang / rmongs 
427a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / bcings par rnam par bsam mo// gang gi tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skyo na sa bon gyis yi ge la dmigs pas gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ste/ na ma A dz+nyA ba le ki te shwa rA ya 
427a8(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ oMny+dza re sh+tsat+tA re tu re swAhA// sarba duSh+TA na/ praduSh+TAn/ makr-i te dzay+YA/ sta b+ha ya/ ma hA ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ dz+ra trA~M hUM/ 
427b1(rgyud 'grel): phaTaphaT/ sarba duSh+TAn swa b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ srung ba 'di dag kyang thun mtshams bzhir bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du lam du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas mdud pa bor nas 
427b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dran pa ldan par byin na chom rkun pa dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul dang / nags kyi ba min dang / chu la spyod pa rnams kyis brdzi bar mi nus te/ gang gi 
427b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'jigs pa dang bral ba na mdud pa slar dgrol bar bya'o// de ltar yun rings bla ma bsten las gang thob pa'i// sgrub thabs chog 'di ni legs bkod pas// sgrol ma zhes grags sras 
427b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas bzhugs pa'i gnas// glu 'dzin dpal du 'gro rnams mur 'gro shog/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar gyi 
427b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra barma dang / bid kyil ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ tsor ban+d+ha/ bad skad du 
427b6(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun bcing ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir them pa nas gom pa bdun gzhal ba'i sa nas lag pa g.yas pas sa spang ba 
427b7(rgyud 'grel): gang blangs la/ de nas rang skad cig gis rje btsun mar bskyed la/ skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sa de la las ri bab tsam du bskyed de 
427b8(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon du baM las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la/ dmigs pas de ring bdag la gnod pa byed pa'i chom rkun thams cad mdun du bkug ste/ me'i tshig gis bar mchod par sngags 
428a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re asma a pa ka ra sarba tso ra ban+d+ha swA hA zhes bya'o// mdun gyi chom rkun pa thams cad rgya mtsho chen por blugs la/ g.yas/ 
428a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis de g.yon du spos la ri rab kyis mnan par bsam mo// de nas sa de thub g.yon par bcings te 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas dgrol bar bya'o// 'gro ba'i dus su bstod pa la 
428a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o// chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa rdzogs so// / ma hA praN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta dang / lo ts+tsha ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // 
428a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs / @#rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra tsar+ya yak+Shi Ni ma drA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma

428a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi spangs leb la bris te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gcer bu ras kyi gos bsnams pa/ mgo skyes li ba/ gzhon nu ma rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ shing mya ngan med pa dang bcas pa
428a7(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pas gzung ba/ lag pa g.yas pas ras bsnams pa/ spyan sa bon gyi grong khyer gyi 'bras bu la gzigs pa/ zhal cung zad dpangs mtho ba/ bzhad pa/ 'khrig pa 
428a8(rgyud 'grel): la sred pa 'di 'dra ba spang leb la bris la/ dben pa'i gnas su rang gcig pur khrus bya zhing bkug pas thun mtshams su mchod do// ba'i lci bas maN+Dal byas la/ gtsang sbra tho ba
428b1(rgyud 'grel): dben par zas gtsang ba za zhing thun mtshams gsum du b+ha gar sor mo bcug la de'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'byon no// byon nas tsan da na dkar po dang / me tog 
428b2(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pos spras pa'i mchod yon dbul lo// kho mo ci bgyi zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos smras pa// kho bo'i sring mo'am mar mdzod cig/ de nas gzung ste sring mo' 
428b3(rgyud 'grel): mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dang bcas pa'i skye bo bcu drug gis zas gos sbyor bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'khur gyis dpal gyi ri bo ta lar khrid par byed do// der 'phags pa spyan ras
428b4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal mthong nas chos zhan cing byang chub kyi sems ma rmongs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// gal te 'dod na slar dzam+bu'i gling nas 'ongs shing de dang rol par 'gyur 
428b5(rgyud 'grel): ro// gal te dang po nyi ma bdun gyis ma grub na de'i tshe bdun phrag gnyis pal tshangs pa bsad kyang 'grub bo// de nas slar ma grub na khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha 
428b6(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ oM dze yak+Shi Ni bi ra dze swA hA/ gnod sbyin mo'i sngags na nga du bcug nas bzlas na/ de nas gal te des kyang ma grub na skams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi 
428b7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa gang dang de ru gnas pa 'am 'bum phrag gsum bzlas so// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi 
428b8(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po bai ro tsa na'i zhal snga na sa dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// @me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bzhugs so/ 
429a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sra ga d+ha ra sA d+ha naM/ sa sU ti/ bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bstod pa dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 
429a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// mi shes pa rnams 'joms pa'i phyir// bcom ldan sgrol ma phreng 'dzin gyi// sgrub pa thabs kyi rim pa 'di// de nyid 'dod pa rgyun du bya// yid 'phrog gtsang ma'i gnas
429a3(rgyud 'grel): su 'dug/ dngos sam sngags kyi rnal 'byor bkru// mthun rkyen mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dngos sam yid kyis brten par bya// shar du kha bltas rnal 'byor pas// gzhan 
429a4(rgyud 'grel): phan sems kyis lha mo bsgom// 'dam dkar zla gnas bzhengs pa yi// dpag med yon tan rgyan gyis spras// ston ka'i dbang po lta bur dkar// rang bzhin gsar du shar bas 
429a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// ut+pal 'dab ltar spyan mdzes shing // dpral bar sin d+hu ra yis kus// rna ba mgul rgyan phyag gdub dang // do shal rked pa rkang pa la// g.yer gsil sil rab tu mdzes// 
429a6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa'i sku can rab tu mdzes// nu mar mu tig do shal ldan// sham thabs za 'og rgyan gyis brgyan// sman mas ut+pal pa dang sa 'phrog pa// rin chen gyis spras cod pan ni// 
429a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam bu'i gser gyi steng na bcings// ral par 'od dpag med pas brgyan// 'di nyid yid 'ong mdzes pa ste// mthong dang brjod dang dran pa yis// khams gsum sems can thams 
429a8(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// snying gi sdig pa thams cad 'joms// gang zhig bcom ldan 'das ma ru// skad cig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal du// rgyun tu bskyed par bya 
429b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya// las kun byed pa'i sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor pas ni bya ba'o// rtag tu'am ni thun gsum du// 
429b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni gtsang ma'i khrus bya'o// tshangs par spyod pa gzung bar bya// gos ni thun gyi dus su spro// mi dge bcu po 'joms par bya// mi dge'i las ni thams cad la// yid ni sbyar
429b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mi bya'o// de bzhin sgrub pa po yis ni// bcom ldan 'das mar rang nyid ni// dngos su ma byas bar du bsgom// de la sngon du byed pa yis// man ngag dam pa bshad par bya// 
429b4(rgyud 'grel): srog 'dzin ma rig ling tog ni// 'joms par byed pa kho na'o// ji ltar A li'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med chu yi dkyil 'khor lo// sgyu ma'i sa bon 'dzag pa yi// rgyun dang 
429b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa blta bar bya// dag par mi byed de 'og tu// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rang bzhin la// kho na nyid kyis sa bon ni// nyi ma phyed pa'i 'odi dang mtshungs// sgron ma'i rnam pa thams
429b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// mi shes sreg par mdzad pa ste// phyogs bcu po yang sbyong bar mdzad// steng gi sa bon 'dzag pa can// bdud rtsi'i rgyun du yid kyis ni// yun ring dus su bsgom pa'o// / 
429b7(rgyud 'grel): de las skyo bar gyur pa na// lce ni chu skyes 'dab ma la// bla ma'i man ngag bsam par bya// de nas sngags kyi phreng ba ni// rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur bskor// nor bu sngags kyi stobs 
429b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang // bdud rtsi gzhan yang yon tan stobs// rdzab khron par gzhug par bya// rgyun mi chad pa'i bsam gtan du// rnal 'byor
430a1(rgyud 'grel): pas ni bzlas pa nyid// gang zhig de ltar yid kyis ni// bya ba 'di ni goms pa na// bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// rgyun mi chad pa skye bar 'gyur// 'dir/ 
430a2(rgyud 'grel): ni'adi yi bsam gtan gyi// nim bdun du byas pa na// shes rab che dang ngag dbang rno// rkang drug tshogs kyis bdag por 'gyur// tshigs su bcad dang lkug pa dang // 'dres pa 
430a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni lU yi skad// tshogs med dag gi dbang phyug ni// 'bad pa med par 'grub pa ste// 'di la the cham ma byed cig/ de nas bsnyad pa brjod pa yang // me tog phreng bzhid yin no// 
430a4(rgyud 'grel): de dang do ni zhal las shes// shes rab pha rol byin ma ni// dngos su grub par 'dod pa yis// rnal 'byor bas na reg pa 'di// ri bong byed la dus gsum du// gong du bshad 
430a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga yis// sngon gyi brtul zhugs spyad nas ni// dben pa'i gnas su sems gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das ma'i bskyed pa ni// rgun chad med par brjod par bya// de nas 
430a6(rgyud 'grel): klog pa'i man ngag ni// brjod ma thag tu yid la ni// rtsa ba nas ni rtse mo'i bar// ji ltar rim pas rjes su ni// kho na nyid kyi sa bon dang // nus pa'i sa bon byed par ldan// sgyu 
430a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sa bon brjod pa nyid// rim pas bcom ldan 'das ma yis// yon tan brjod pa'i 'od zer gyis// g.yeng ba med par bdag nyid ni// yid ni brtan pas klog bzhir/ 
430a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid shar ba'i zhim ste// de yi gdan la bsam par bya// sgyu ma byed pa'i nyi ma ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// nus pastan ka'i zla ba ste// pad+ma'i rtsel bsam pazhed//

436a5(rgyud 'grel): bye// 'dab rgyas yi ge 'od 'bar bas// slar yang bdud rtsi'i bsil dang ra blang // dkar 'jam snum mazhen mkhregs dang sra ba// yid 'ong dri mas ma gos pa'o// zil dngar snying

436a7(rgyud 'grel): khyab kun bkang la// sdig bdug yid kyi mun pa rnams// zhims mun bsal ji gzhon no// rtsa ba'i yi ge mchog gcig la// g.yed med 'bum phrag bco lnga bzlas// dngos dang 
436a8(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam brda gzugs kyis// ltas gsum phyi rol mthong bar 'gyur// de 'og pad+ma 'khor lo spur// dbyangs yig ral gri phyed mtshan par// skad cig rnam pas bsgyur zhing bskor/ 
436b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags 'bru bcu bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra de wi pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha hAM hUM/ rang snying mun sel brtan pa dang // gzhan yid mun se la g.yo ba yi// 'bum phrag gsum ni rtse 
436b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig bzlas// lkugs pa'ang ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyur// nang skye zla rgyas pa wa sangs// gsung ba sgron ma 'bar ba mthong // brda gsum gzugs sgra yod shes te// mtshon/ 
436b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i 'khor lo brtags gzhan yin// de nas sbyin sgeg sngon song bas// brgya rtsa brgyad mchod blo gros spel// de yis tshar bcad rjes bzung bas// lnga phrag gnyis 'grub the tshom 
436b4(rgyud 'grel): med// rtsod dang dgra 'dul dug gzhi la dang // 'chi bdag bzlog pa dang po ste// blo gros sngags rig snyan dngags dang // klog dang sngags 'grub gnyis pa yin// yang na thob ma 
436b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rtse mos// lhag ma bzhi bzhi lha mo gzhan// 'khor yin lnga gnyis dkyil 'khor mdzes// de bzhin gnyis gtso gzhan brgyad 'khar// rdo rje lha mo la gnas lce// 'khor la dbyangs

436b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis gtubs ro ras dkris// 'dre gnas sar mnan nges par 'chi// lhag pa'i lhas brgyan lho mo nyid// khro mo zhal brgya phrag stong can// lugs kyu zhags pa ral gri yis// bkug 
436b8(rgyud 'grel): cing sngun na shin tu 'jams// dam tshig lhums ye shes kyi// lha drangs bum par bdud rtsi bsgrub// sngon mtshams pad+ma hU~M thig le// rgyun 'dzag dug gzhal dbyung bar bya// sno 
437a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil srog yig rin chen sgron// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'od gas la// a phreng ka spel bskor gzigs// gur phub rgyu 'bebs 'chi med 'gyur// ji skad 
437a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad lha mo nyid// de bzhin lha mo lnga lnga dgu// sna gsum bdag gzhan snying la bsgom// blo gros rab 'phel gdon mi za// dpal mi mgrin par chu skyes dbus// dung 
437a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yas 'khyil sbubs ltar ba// nga ro bcu drug gsang bstod sgrogs// de myur tshangs dbyangs ngag thob 'gyur// gtsang zhing rab gtsang pad snying dbus// 'ja' ris 
437a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal be'u zer gsal bas// klog phreng rgyun 'dra rdo rje'i lce// rnam bskyod snyan dngags mkhan 'drar 'gyur// 'dam skyes ri bong rdo rje yis// sbyor bas lce rtser tshangs yig bskyed// 
437a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i ljags skyes rdo rje lhung / de blang ka la ping ka mtshungs// rje btsun ljags pad zla steng du// dbyangs gsal rdo rje ral gris mtshan// bro gar 'gyu glags ye shes bkug/ de rgyun sus 
437a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs sngags 'grub 'gyur// thun mtshams gtsang zhing rab dkar zas// mngar gsil sna tshogs gtung bar byas// 'bru gsum rang sngags byin brlabs la// bdud rtsi'i sbyor 
437a7(rgyud 'grel): ba saM ga tor ma sbyin// oM AHbadz+ra pri ti de wi sa pa ri wa ra a mr-i te ba li ta khA hi khA hi/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT swA hA// 'jam dbyangs lha mo dbyangs snyan ma// rab mdzes tshangs 
437a8(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs blo bzang ma// mtshungs med snying dbus mgrin skyong ma// 'dod dgur bsgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ma// mi tshe mi sku tshe 'dzin ma// bag yod yid 
437b1(rgyud 'grel): 'o nor ster ma// tshangs spyod tshangs rigs ma khyod 'dud// dpal ldan dbyangs can brtag pa'i de nyid rgya mtsho mkha' dang gter lhur zab cing rgya che sbas pa las// rdo rje lha mo ri dbang 
437b2(rgyud 'grel): phung po sangs rgyas khang bzangs lnga phrag gnyis sgrub nyis tshogs dri ma kun bsal 'di// zla zer bsil bas ku mu da ltar phye de yi laM las dge 'od rin chen 'bar ba'i sgron mthus gang 
437b3(rgyud 'grel): thothib des// ma lus lus can rdo rje lha mo'i dbyangs snyan myur thob tshangs chen nga ros sa gsum rnam par rol par shog/ dpal rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma'i sgrub thabs snyan dngags mkhan 
437b4(rgyud 'grel): chen slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po bud+d+ha shI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur 
437b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// dge/ @dang rdzu pa'i grub sa thabs dang banyid pa bachags/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ba s+yA d+hA ra sA d+ha naM/ sod skad du/

438a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang de'i steng du a yig gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i steng du tsA gi yi ges bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyan mar bsgom par bya ste/ phyag gnyis ma 
438a2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i cod pan can/ sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma/ rol pa'i stobs kyis bzhugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin dang / bum pa bzang po can no// oM shrI ba su d+ha ro haM/ a yig 
438a3(rgyud 'grel): gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ A yig gis ki ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badz+ra pad+ma ha s+t+waM haM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ gsum mo// oM badz+re pa me Ta ke tha ke hUM swA hA/ gsum mo// oM/

438a8(rgyud 'grel): b+ha mu d+ha ri swIr+tha/ ab+hi su d+hi ra~M b+ha su~M prad+b+ha pA d+ha ya b+ha~M mu d+hi ri s+t+raiH/ d+hu tsu b+ha~M sud+ha re sAt+ma/ ladz+dza d+hA ta la ni bA sa d+h+wa~M ye swAt+ma// badz+ra d+har sA gar Ni ga Sha d+da ya sAt+ma/ Ang+ga bi 'i ka shA 
438b1(rgyud 'grel): sA hA/ badza pA Ni yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ya swA hA/ i la de wI ya swA hA/ dza b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ pi tsi kuN+Da li ne swA hA/ ki li mA li ne sA hA/ mu khen+da ya sA hA/ tsu ren+na ya sAtA

438b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ba su ma ti pr-i ye swA hA/ gan+d+ha ba su d+ha ra d+ha ra Ni ye swA hA/ nai be d+hA badz+ra puSh+pe swA hA/ badz+ra bA ya swA hA/ badz+ra daR+sha na pha lA ya swA hA/ badz+ra te b+hU ye swA hA/ oM AHhUM swA hA/

438b8(rgyud 'grel): de/ dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // yang na bgyid su la rjes su yi rang gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni// spyan sngar da lta so sor bshags par

439a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ngo // byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te byams pa ni bu gcig pa ltar mnyes gshin pa'i rnam pa can gyis mtshan nyid do// snying rje ni sdug bsngal

439a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan par byas pa yaM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de'i steng du raM yig gi me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa 'bar bas mtshan par byas pa raM yig gis byin gyis

439b4(rgyud 'grel): du a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i dbus su r+Ya gyi yi ges bum pa bzang po'o// bum pa bzang po yongs su gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo zhal

439b8(rgyud 'grel): ser po chos gos kyis grwa 'dzin pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni sku mdog dmar po phyag na rnga yab can no// gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ldang 
440a1(rgyud 'grel): gu phyag na rnga yab can no// lha mo i la mdog ser mo rin po che'i ske ma 'dzin pa'o// chu'i dbang po dzaM b+ha la sku mdog sngon po ne'u le dang / shing tog bi dza pU ra 
440a2(rgyud 'grel): ka 'dzin pa'o// pi tsi kun+d+ra l-i mdog dmar po lag nam tog can no// ka le mA li mdog dmar po lag na bdug spos can na// sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po lag na mar me can no// spyod pa'i 
440a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po mdog dmar po lag na dri chab can no// sbas ma mdog sngo bsangs lag na rnga yab can no// legs sbas ma mdog dmar me lag na bdugs can no// dbyangs can ma mdog ser

440b7(rgyud 'grel): zung dag la rnam zos sras so// rkang pa gnyis la tsi pi kuN+Da li'o// gseng ba la ke le mA li ni'o// snying khar zhal bzhi dbang po'o// yan lag thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang po'o// 
440b8(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod pa dang me tog dgod pa dang / sgeg mo brgyad do// bsam gyis mi khyab rdzas ni rtag tu 'phel ched dang // rin chen du mgo ser ni 'phel 
441a1(rgyud 'grel): ched du// khang pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa// dpal ldan nor rgyun ma la rtag phyag 'tshal// bzlas pa dang gtor ma'o// oM b+ha su d+ha re 
441a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba b+ha ya ha ye big+h+nAn shAn+ti ka re pra kri ta pra b+ha swa re i ma ba li gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM Ar+ya nutaM pan+da tAta oM AHhUM/ ak+Sha ma nAM pra tits+tsha swA hA/ me tog la sogs 
441a3(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod par bya ba rdzogs so// / 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs bzangs gzugs mdzes mchog ster ma// nair 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma// nor

441a7(rgyud 'grel): gter dang bkra shis thams cad dang // grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge/ sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste// 'tshe byed ma mo thams cad ma// gshin rje skrag mdzad drag

441b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims bsam gtan sgom mdzad ma// pad+ma can dang pad+ma 'dzin// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mo// dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che// gser 
441b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can 'od mdzad ma// yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo// shes rab glegs ba ma 'dzin pa mo// gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma// nor dang ldan mdzad nor dga' ma// 
441b4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyur ma// rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma// dngos po stong nyid bsgom lha mo//

441b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma// bram ze ma dang rig byed yum// sbas ma bug na gnas pa mo// dbyangs can ma dang spyan yang sa ma// tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi ldan pa mo// de bzhin gshegs 
441b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dgyes chen ma// rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'chang // las 'dzin 'jug cing las 'dzin ma// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs 'bar// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo// sems
441b8(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi rtogs mdzad ma// byang chub yan lag thob mdzad ma// bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma// gnyis med gnyis med bsgom mdzad ma// don kun sgrub mdzad bzang 
442a1(rgyud 'grel): mo ste// bud med gzugs can dkar mo gnon// sangs rgyas las rnams ston mdzad ma// ngag gi dbang mo ston mche// srung mdzad 'dzin mdzad nor 
442a2(rgyud 'grel): ster ma// bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo// rnal 'byor dbang phyag rnal 'byor ma// yid 'phrog ma dang gzugs mdzes ma// skal bzang dga' ba ston pa mo// ded dpon ma 
442a3(rgyud 'grel): dang brtse ldan ma// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag nyi dam// lha mo chen mo khyod la 'dud// sems can kun gyi don ster ma// bzang po'i gzugs can khyod la 'dud// 
442a4(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyun ma khyod la phyag 'tshal// mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa 'di// gang zhig dus gsum klog byed pa// yid kyi shing rtas 'dod byed pa// thams cad nges par thob par 
442a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// mtshams med pa dang cha 'thun gang // shin tu mi bzad las rnams ni// de rnams thams cad mtshan bzang po// rjes su dran las zad par 'gyur// yang na

442a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// mthar ni sa yi dbang thob nas// bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// me brgya rtsa brgyad bklags pa yis// lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur// 'phags ma nor rkun

442b1(rgyud 'grel): bur ldan la kun nas chags// byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rno ba can// shin tu che ba'i rigs skyes gzugs mdzes pa// bdag ni skye ba skye bar bde gshegs kyi// snyan 
442b2(rgyud 'grel): dngags mkhan po mnyam med rgya che dang // tshe ring rigs skye skyes bu blo gros gsal// mkhas shing blo gros mi dman bcom ldan gyi// gsung rab la mkhas bde ldan snying rje can// /

443a1(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi mgon mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud// nad dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyon mang sgrol// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman//

443a3(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa bde 'gro'i nye bar ster byed pa// nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs de la ni dus rtag tu// mtha' dag sems can phan par sems pas gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// gang

443b1(rgyud 'grel): sbrul ni bsdams pa yi// gdengs ka'i nor bu mkha' lding me long ste// gzhug ma'i gzugs mthong ngo mtshar skyes gyur pa'i// khro ba spangs pa de ni rgyal gyur cig/ mkha' lding

443b8(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i lus// 'dab brgya rgyas 'dras mtshan pa lhag ma can// nor rgyas lus ni kha dog dkar po la// mtshan pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra sman po yin// shar zag ni ma'i 'od zer la bu la/

444a2(rgyud 'grel): cho gas lta bu'i thig les gdengs ka mdzes// bad chen zla 'od bskus pa lta bu la// mdung rtse gsum pa lta bu gdengs ka yin// dung skyong ki ni ya ra'i me tog 'dra// mgrin par 
444a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i cha yis mtshan pa yin// rigs ldan gyi ni spyi bo'i gdengs ka dag/ du bu lta bu'i zla ba byed pa yin// dbyig pa yis ni brdeg pa mchog yin te// klu rnams gzung nas
